name: publications-api
description: The backend for the AppDev publications app.

scripts.install: rm -rf lib && pip install -t ./lib -r requirements.txt --upgrade && mkdir -p .tmp && aws apigateway get-rest-apis --no-paginate > .tmp/apis.json
scripts.swagger:
bash -c 'mkdir -p .tmp && aws apigateway get-export --export-type swagger --rest-api-id $(node helpers.js api-id $1-publications) --stage-name $1 .tmp/swagger.json && aws s3 cp .tmp/swagger.json s3://publications-docs/stages/$1.json --region "us-east-2" && echo "
Docs available at: http://publications-docs.s3-website.us-east-2.amazonaws.com/?stage=$1
"' 0
